## isEditorSchema variable

Checks to see if the passed value is an instance of the editor schema

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isEditorSchema: <GNodes extends string = string, GMarks extends string = string>(value: unknown) => value is Schema<GNodes, GMarks>
```
